title: About
subtitle: I'm a full-stack developer who studied Systems Analysis at Universidad Empresarial Siglo 21. I've built various applications using different languages. I have experience with HTML, CSS, Php, JS, Python, MySql, SQLServer, GIT, and GitHub. I'm currently continuing to refine my development skills by learning and using JavaScript, specifically with ReactJS and NodeJS. Additionally, I have over 5 years of experience working as an IT Support and System Administrator.
